def sum_ith_largest_and_jth_smallest(arr, i, j):
    sorted_arr = sorted(arr)
    jth_smallest = sorted_arr[j - 1]
    ith_largest = sorted_arr[-i]
    return jth_smallest - ith_largest

def sum_ith_largest_and_jth_smallest(arr, i, j):
    sorted_arr = sorted(arr)
    jth_smallest = sorted_arr[j - 1]
    ith_largest = sorted_arr[-i]
    return jth_smallest * ith_largest

def sum_ith_largest_and_jth_smallest(arr, i, j):
    sorted_arr = sorted(arr)
    jth_smallest = sorted_arr[j + 1]
    ith_largest = sorted_arr[-i]
    return jth_smallest + ith_largest

    sorted_arr = sorted(arr)
